title: [Large-scale] Workshop on Designing Social Studies Activities Based on Interactive Learning Spaces

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in social studies learning and fundamental skills in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Optimized for interactive real-time online platforms for learners with experience in discussion and collaborative projects on social issues

learning_goals: Learners can propose three or more activity-based social studies lesson designs in interactive learning spaces.
Learners can plan and execute real-time collaborative projects using digital tools.
Learners can explain how to analyze educational effectiveness through pre-post assessment design.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
